text: 4Music was a British music channel owned by Channel 4. The channel replaced The Hits on 15 August 2008 showing music and entertainment. On 29 June 2022, 4Music got replaced by E4 Extra, and Box Hits was replaced by 4Music. Entertainment was moved to E4 Extra. 4Music closed on 1 July 2024. Its last song was Raise Your Glass by Pink. == References == Category:British television
title: 4Music
